Name: The Chronicles of Dragon Wing - Reborn
About the game: PVP SRPG This unique PVP game makes you experience the charm of SRPG that you never meet before. With classic turn-basic mechanism, every move is worth consideration. Game Map Maps are make up of hexagon terrains. Forest that let you dodge physic attack, Wind Rest Array that makes you move again, and Alchemy Array that can draw a card, all these different terrains are the key to succeed. Hero There are tons of combination with heroes. Each hero, each skill can have reaction with others. Are you ready? Pick your hero and join a wonderful battle. Equipment There three types of equipment: weapon, armor and accessory. At the beginning, players can get equipment with useful functionality. And you can get even more when you promote your progress. Magical Card Magical card is the most use card except skill. There are over 30 types of magical card. Although your good fortune may not a decisive factor, a magical card can sometimes change your situation. Multiplayer There are various modes in the game, Except the conventional 1V1 mode, we had prepared 3V3 mode. Call your friends and play together! Story Mode Well-designed story mode levels, helps you learn the game better, and lead you to the myth of Dragon Wing continent.
